participant_1.background:
I'd rather not talk about my parents, but I'm happy to answer any other questions.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
i cannot stand clutter or dust.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.
I sing nursery rhymes for my son on weekends because he loves them.

participant_2.background:
My flute playing is a form of self-expression and a way to connect with my inner self.
I lost my best friend, my dog, when I was away on business.
i ride a skateboard.
my name is dave.
i enjoy comedies.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy playing the flute, skateboarding, and watching comedies.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to play the flute.
It's a lot of fun! I've been playing for about 10 years now.
That's awesome! I've always been more interested in sports. I like to play basketball and soccer.
That's great! I've never been very good at sports, but I enjoy watching them.
What's your favorite sport to watch?
I like watching basketball and football. I also enjoy watching the Olympics.
That's great! I like watching the Olympics too. I'm a big fan of the winter Olympics.
I love the winter Olympics too! I love watching all of the different winter sports.
Me too! It's so much fun to watch people compete at such a high level.
I agree! It's really inspiring to see people push themselves to the limit.
It sure is! I love the Olympics.
